name: Blast-Off!
description:
Blast Off! is a top-scrolling space survival game where your goal is to get the highest score that you can. 

Controls: Arrow Keys or WASD to move left and right, and space to pause the game.

Made for ZenoJam

*Warning* Fast Moving Screen/background in later points of game

Resources Used:

KidsCanCode Godot Recipes:  Heart Containers and Screen Wrap

Data Saving Code from Godot QA

Art: Sogmn: Explosion Animation

Sound:

TinyWorlds: Explosion Sound

Onky: Main Game Theme

yd: Main Menu Theme
